SIZE_SUBTEXT_1: A bracelet should sit snugly on the wrist and not slide up and down
SIZE_SUBTEXT_2: To measure your bracelet size, hold out your hand with your thumb outstretched and aligned with your other fingers. Using a measuring tape or even a strip of paper, measure your hand circumference.
SIZE_SUBTEXT_3: Recommended to wear 15 - 20 charms regardless of bracelet length.

HOME_SUBTEXT_3: We believe that great style begins with great design. Every single piece is conceived in our studio, where designers sketch, drape, tuck and bead a collection to life
HOME_SUBTEXT_4: Sophisticated and perfectly chunky, this is the kind of piece that adds a touch of effortless polish to just about any outfit.
